description: Try our easy to follow Green Goddess Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Salad,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Summer,Halal,Christmas,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Tomato,Avocado,Peanut free
name: Green Goddess Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine salad mix with cucumber, cherry tomatoes and marinated artichokes in a large bowl.
Scoop flesh from avocado into a food processor with buttermilk and lemon juice and process until smooth.
Stir in finely chopped chives and finely chopped spring onions. Season with salt and pepper. Serve salad with salt and pepper and dressing.
